“POTENTIAL FOR 3QEARNING (A Searching Look at Television}“ Page 13
VIDEO __ AUDIO _
(NARRATOR) veins.•o
and intellect.
Not yet known fully to himself or to
others...
he brings to those Who teach» his
potential for living in one or all
of three worlds...
the world of the senses...
A child reacting to the
delightful gooeyness and vivid
color and exciting skid of
finger paint
the world of sense...
Another child laboriously
copying letters from the models
in his workbook.•.or arranging
letter cards to form words...
and the world of synthesis...
A child involved in some simple
manipulation of natural science
materials.e.perhaps putting
cotton from a cotton boll on the
cotton chart.•.
And he brings something else as well.
A wealth of secondary experience
